result.eng: Are you happy in your life?
result.ga: an bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.orig: an bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.html: an bhfuil tú sásta i do shaolAre you happy in your life?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil tú sásta i do ẛaolAre you happy in your life?

result.eng: Do you use Irish in your daily life?
result.ga: an mbaineann tú úsáid as an ghaeilge i do shaol laethúil
result.orig: an mbaineann tú úsáid as an ghaeilge i do shaol laethúil
result.html: an mbaineann tú úsáid as an ghaeilge i do shaol laethúilDo you use Irish in your daily life?
result.ponchtml: an mbaineann tú úsáid as an ġaeilge i do ẛaol laeṫúilDo you use Irish in your daily life?

result.eng: Did she have a long life?
result.ga: an raibh saol fada aici
result.orig: an raibh saol fada aici
result.html: an raibh saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?
result.ponchtml: an raiḃ saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?

result.eng: Life as it was a long time ago.
result.ga: an saol mar a bhí fadó
result.orig: an saol mar a bhí fadó
result.html: an saol mar a bhí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: an saol mar a ḃí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.

result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?
result.ga: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo
result.orig: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo
result.html: cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?
result.ponchtml: cad a rinne tú ar feaḋ do ẛaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?

result.eng: He spent his whole life on the island.
result.ga: chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.orig: chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán
result.html: chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ sé a ẛaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ga: chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: How does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ga: conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.orig: conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.html: conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ponchtml: conas a ullṁaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taoḃ amuiġ den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?

result.eng: Our life on earth is temporary.
result.ga: is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.orig: is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.html: is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamhOur life on earth is temporary.
result.ponchtml: is neaṁḃuan ár mbeaṫa ar talaṁOur life on earth is temporary.

result.html: tá saol iontach agatYou have a great life!
result.ponchtml: tá saol iontaċ agatYou have a great life!

result.eng: The life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ga: níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.orig: níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.html: níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ aon ġaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ġnáṫoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.

result.ga: tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.orig: tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.html: tá a saol ag titim as a chéileHer life is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: tá a saol ag titim as a ċéileHer life is falling apart.

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na meiriceánach dúchasach
result.orig: shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na meiriceánach dúchasach
result.html: shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na meiriceánach dúchasachShe thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ponchtml: ẛíl sí nár ṫit poncúlaċt isteaċ le dearcaḋ saoil na meiriceánaċ dúċasaċShe thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ponchtml: ar do ḃás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
